overview: Byeong-Tae, who suffers from cerebral palsy, comes to the station office by mistake. He meets Min-Wu, who is caught on charge of a free ride and Chun-Ja, who tried to kill herself. Chun-Ja steals the purse of Byeong-Tae and causes trouble. The pregnant Chun-Ja gives birth to a baby in a barn of farmer, and she marries Min-Wu in a church. They arrive to the Chun-Ja's hometown, but Byeong-Tae separates from them in order to go to Kyeong-Ju. He returns home after traveling Kyeong-Ju.
title: Hello God
